mapper.select: /* User.selectUserSttus */ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT '4' rtnCode, '정상' rtnMsg, COUNT(*) cnt FROM TB_MBR_INFO_M WHERE eml_addr = #{eml_addr} AND pswd = #{pswd} AND pswd_init_yn='Y' UNION SELECT '3' rtnCode, '정상' rtnMsg, COUNT(*) cnt FROM TB_MBR_INFO_M WHERE eml_addr = #{eml_addr} AND pswd = #{pswd} UNION SELECT '2' rtnCode, '비밀번호가 일치하지 않습니다' rtnMsg, COUNT(*) cnt FROM TB_MBR_INFO_M WHERE eml_addr = #{eml_addr} UNION SELECT '1' rtnCode, '존재하지 않는 아이디 입니다' rtnMsg, 1 ) a where cnt > 0 order by rtnCode desc limit 1
mapper.insert: /* User.insertUserInfo */ INSERT INTO TB_MBR_INFO_M (mbr_name, eml_addr, pswd, mbr_tel, prvc_trms_agre_dt, srvc_trms_agre_dt, mbr_id) VALUES ( #{mbr_name}, #{eml_addr}, #{pswd}, #{mbr_tel}, now(), now(), #{mbr_id} )
